name: Embody (Semi-done Post-Jam Ver.)
description:
Original Jam version here, password "GHOST"

I was looking through some old projects and realized that I hadn't ever uploaded this old revamped test build of Embody, which based on the file dates was last worked on around October 20th, 2020. Thought I'd throw it out there, even if I'm not ever sure when I'll come back to it to bring all of the actually cool concepts that this was meant for to life. 

Having dug around for a bit, it seems I was playing around with my own level generation system and endlessly tweaking the UI and possession-energy balancing. There's a camera debug with the arrow keys and toggled with "C", and debug information (on by default... I guess?) togglable by "Q". SPACE and "P" were the possession-dash and attack buttons, respectively, if I recall correctly.
